Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it only sums up the first number in the array that is not 13 and then breaks the loop. It does not continue to sum up the rest of the numbers in the array. Also, it does not skip the number that immediately follows a 13. Generated Test cases 1-9 (9/17) should pass the buggy code because they contain only one number that is not 13 or they are empty. The rest of the test cases (10-17) should fail the buggy code because they contain more than one number that is not 13 or they contain a 13 followed by another number.
